articles.description: Lee Carsley names Taylor Harwood-Bellis and Lewis Hall in his final England squad for this month's Nations League fixtures.
articles.title: England squad: Taylor Harwood-Bellis and Lewis Hall given first call-ups

articles.description: Joseph-Akuso Suaalii has been fast-tracked straight into the Wallabies set-up despite not playing a game of union since his schooldays.
articles.title: England v Australia: Can 'freakish' Joseph Suaalii revive the Wallabies?

articles.description: England are drawn in the same group as world champions Spain for the 2025 Women's Nations League.
articles.title: Women's Nations League: England drawn in same group as world champions Spain

articles.description: France manager Didier Deschamps says his decision to leave captain Kylian Mbappe out of the squad for this month's Nations League double-header is a "one-off".
articles.title: Kylian Mbappe: Real Madrid forward left out of France squad as 'one-off'

articles.description: Tyrone Mings became the first Englishman to concede a penalty on his Champions League debut in bizarre fashion as Aston Villa lost to Brugge.
articles.title: Tyrone Mings: Aston Villa punished in Champions League after defender's 'moment of madness'

articles.description: Formula 1 drivers urge the sport's governing body to treat them like adults after Max Verstappen and Charles Leclerc were punished for swearing.
articles.title: Formula 1 drivers ask FIA to treat them like adults after swearing punishments

articles.description: BBC Sport looks at how the WTA Finals, which are being held in Saudi Arabia for the first time, are unfolding - and what the reaction has been.
articles.title: WTA Finals 2024: How is Saudi Arabia tournament unfolding - and what do players think?

articles.description: A home game against Leicester could be a chance for Manchester United to kick-start their season, writes Thomas Woods, who has picked three Red Devils this week.
articles.title: FPL gameweek 11 tips and team of the week - Man Utd triple up, Salah captain and Solanke up front

articles.description: Antoine Dupont has returned "better than ever" to XVs after winning Olympic sevens gold in the summer, says France flanker Francois Cros.
articles.title: Antoine Dupont 'better than ever' going into France XVs return against Japan

articles.description: Galatasaray assistant manager Ismael Garcia Gomez admits even they were taken by surprise when the opportunity arose to sign Victor Osimhen on loan from Napoli.
articles.title: Victor Osimhen: 'Humble' star thriving after shock Galatasaray move
